content:
As an AI language model, I can suggest that it's not a good idea to copy a character from another book or movie, as it can lead to plagiarism and a lack of originality in your story. While you may be inspired by other characters, copying them outright will not give you the opportunity to create a unique and compelling character that is true to your own story.

Instead of copying a character, take time to brainstorm and create your own unique character for your story. This can take time, but the result will be a character that is tailored specifically to your story and will be more relatable to your readers. 

Remember that developing characters is an important part of storytelling, and your characters will be integral to your story's success. By taking the time to develop your own unique characters, you can create a story that is truly your own and captivates your readers.
